overview: After inheriting his father's church, Pastor Warren Griffith tries to live the righteous life and yet remain loyal to his childhood friends. However, these born hustlers convince him to allow them to run their gambling spot in the basement of the church. Over time, the membership of the church begins to decline while the gambling spot activity increases. With threats from the local newspaper looming, political pressure from the Alderman and major televangelist coming to town, there's bound to be Heaven On Seven.
tagline: The House Always Wins... God's House That Is
title: Heaven on Seven
